Articles.Content:
[COLOR=#333333][Under construction - lots of work left to do here, still!]

Welcome to the new thread! To inaugurate the switch to the new forums I'm doing something I've been meaning to do for quite some time - update and release everything I've been working on since 1.0! We'll also pay respects to those older designs have been retired, and for the first time ever I'm going to open up the aircraft hanger and give a brief look at some unfinished projects in various stages of development.

[/COLOR][COLOR=#333333]But first, two small orders of business:[/COLOR][COLOR=#333333]
[/COLOR][TABLE="width: 50%, align: left"]
[TR]
[TD][URL="http://imgur.com/GGejkRR"]HERE[/URL][COLOR=#333333] is our glorious SAD banner, may she ever fly as high as we can dream.[/COLOR][/TD]
[TD][COLOR=#333333]Second, when flying any of these aircraft please make sure Aircraft controls are enabled (Capslock hotkey by default). Using default rocket controls instead will often result excessive over-correction and unanticipated lithobraking.[/COLOR][/TD]
[/TR]
[TR]
[TD][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GGejkRR.png[/IMG][/TD]
[TD][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Nfq4FXI.png?1[/IMG]
Blue indicators are the correct setting for flying aircraft.[/TD]
[/TR]
[/TABLE]

[COLOR=#333333]


[/COLOR][COLOR=#333333][SIZE=5][SIZE=2]And now... on to the planes!

[/SIZE][/SIZE][/COLOR][HR][/HR][COLOR=#333333][SIZE=5][SIZE=2]
